fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player to attack.
- **Tune** during the day, causing your roll to be 5-15 instead. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - At the beginning of the night, you roll a random number between 1-20. You get the abilities of your number and every number below.

fields.name: Rolls:
fields.value:
- 1: Get Vulnerable Defense if your roll is exactly 1
- 2: Roleblocked the next night if your roll is at most 2
- 3: None Defense the next night if your roll is at most 3
- 4: Attacks to you are converted to an Unstoppable Attack if you roll at most 4
- 5: Nothing
- 6: Basic Defense
- 7: Basic Attack
- 8: Detection Immunity
- 9: Control and Redirect Immune
- 10: Roleblock Immune
- 11: Powerful Defense
- 12: Powerful Attack
- 13: Rampage Attack
- 14: Roleblock Target
- 15: Reveal the roles of who your target visits
- 16: Clean Target
- 17: Invincible Defense
- 18: Unstoppable Attack
- 19: Attack your visitors
- 20: Choose two targets to attack
